H0.text: The ESA was 35 years old in 2010. For what does the S stand. Satellite

H1.text: The ESA was 35 years old in 2010. For what does the S stand. Science

H2.text: The ESA was 35 years old in 2010. For what does the S stand. Security

H3.text: The ESA was 35 years old in 2010. For what does the S stand. Space

A5.text: The ESA in its current form was founded with the ESA Convention in 1975, when ESRO was merged with ELDO.
